title: Heavenly Happiness
desc:
Post 1792
- Draw 2 cards.
- Gain 1 **Ethereal** Happy Beam (1791) per card in your hand.
- Any cards with the color <:grave:1119394182310670366> or <:bones:1118750770133737565> in your hand are discarded.
- A non-Ethereal card in your hand of your choosing is now **Armored**.
